tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
    city_id INT,
    resource_id INT,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (city_id, resource_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city_demographics(city_id)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    citizen_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE housing (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    property_type VARCHAR(20),
    num_bedrooms INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE amenities (
    amenity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    amenity_type VARCHAR(30),
    rating INT,
    availability VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    resource_type VARCHAR(30),
    quantity INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE district_demographics (
    district_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    district_name VARCHAR(50),
    city_id INT,
    population INT,
    area_sq_km FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city_demographics(city_id)
);

CREATE TABLE neighborhood_demographics (
    neighborhood_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    neighborhood_name VARCHAR(50),
    district_id INT,
    population INT,
    area_sq_km FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (district_id) REFERENCES district_demographics(district_id)
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT,
    district_id INT,
    neighborhood_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    data_year INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city_demographics(city_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (district_id) REFERENCES district_demographics(district_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES neighborhood_demographics(neighborhood_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES demographic_categories(category_id)
);
